translations.translation: They will go back and forth between fire and scalding water.
They will go round and around between it and boiling water.
They will keep circling around between Hell and boiling water.
They will run around in blazing fire and boiling water.
They shall keep going back and forth between it and the extremely hot boiling water.
They will go between it and Hamim An!
Round about shall they go between it and hot, boiling water.
they shall go round between it and between hot, boiling water.
They go circling round between it and fierce, boiling water.
They will go round between its flames and boiling water.
Going round between it and balling water fierce.
They shall circuit between it and boiling hot water.
In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!
They will go between it (Hell) and the boiling hot water!
they shall go round between it, and between a hot, boiling water.
They circulate between it and between a seething bath.
They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

[55:44] They shall pass round, they shall pace, between it and boiling hot water, [water] of extreme temperature, which they are given to drink every time they call to be rescued from the heat of the Fire (ānin is defective, like qādin).
(They go circling round between it) i.e. the Fire (and fierce, boiling water) water as hot as can be.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ } فالحَميمُ: الحَارُ
 والآنُ: الذي قد انتهى حَرُهُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
فالآن { يَطُوفُونَ } ويترددون { بَيْنَهَا } أي: بين النار { وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ } ماء حار { آنٍ } [الرحمن: 44] متناهٍ في الحرارة إلى حيث يغلب إحراقه وحرارته على النار المسعرة، فأراد سبحانه أنقاذكم منها بإرسال الرسل وإنزال الكتب




{ فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 45] أيها المجبولان على الكفران والنسيان
